橃字的基本解释

橃
fá
海中大船。
古同“筏”，筏子。

橃
fèi
古书上说的类似柚的一种树。
屋栋头。

橃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fá］
［《廣韻》房越切，入月，奉。］
(1)海中大船。
(2)同“筏”。
[②]［fèi］
［《廣韻》方肺切，去廢，非。］
(1)木名。似柚。
(2)屋栋头。

橃字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橃； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页552第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?房越切，音伐。【說文】海中大船。【徐曰】俗作筏，非是。　又【集韻】北末切，音撥。義同。　又【唐韻】【集韻】方吠切，音廢。木似柚也。【類篇】屋棟頭。

橃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
橃字的起名意思

暂无。

Shan
Basic explanation of words
Shan
fá
Big ship in the sea.
The ancient same "raft", raft.
Shan
fèi
A tree similar to pomelo in ancient books.
House Dongtou.
Shan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fá］
["Guangyun" the room is more cut, into the moon, bong. ]
(1) Large ships in the sea.
(2) Same as "raft".
[②]［fèi］
["Guangyun" square lungs cut, go to waste, no. ]
(1) Wooden name. Like pomelo.
(2) The head of the house.
Shan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橃; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 552 No. 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] The more the room is cut, the sound is cut. [Said the text] Big ship in the sea. [Xu Yue] The vulgar is a raft, no.　[Jiyun] North end cut, tone dial. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Fang barked and cut, and the sound was useless. The wood is like a pomelo. 【Classes】House building head.
Shan
